name: starter-job-board
description: Next.js 14 job board starter with job listings, search filters, company profiles, application forms, and employer posting. Blue/indigo theme. TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, App Router.
postMessage:
JobFlow job board starter installed! Run:
1. npm install
2. npm run dev

Customize your job board by editing lib/data.ts (jobs, companies, categories) and replace placeholder-logo.svg with real company logos.
